content: if you ve been wanting to try your hand at a simple colorwork pattern how about this cozy crochet hat featuring patons canadiana this accessory uses colorwork to create interest learn single_crochet half_double_crochet plus half_double_crochet around front and back posts to create a cozy hat as designed or feel free to customize it using any 2 shades you like it s a toasty gift idea around the holidays so make a few for everyone on your list colors for model main color mc navy 10110 1 ball contrast a winter white 10006 1 ball
